1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:1: Urutonde rw’amasekuruza uhereye kuri Adamu ukageza kuri bene Esawu(Itang 5.1-32; 10.1-32; 11.10-26)1.Adamu na Seti na Enoshi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:2: 2.Kenani na Mahalalēli na Yeredi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:3: 3.Henoki na Metusela na Lameki,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:4: 4.Nowa na Shemu na Hamu na Yafeti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:5: 5.Bene Yafeti ni Gomeri na Magogi, na Madayi na Yavani, na Tubali na Mesheki na Tirasi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:6: 6.Bene Gomeri ni Ashikenazi na Rifati na Togaruma.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:7: 7.Bene Yavani ni Elisha na Tarushishi, na Kitimu na Rodanimu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:8: 8.Bene Hamu ni Kushi na Misirayimu, na Puti na Kanāni.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:9: 9.Bene Kushi ni Seba na Havila, na Sabuta na Rāma na Sabuteka. Bene Rāma ni Sheba na Dedani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:10: 10.Kushi yabyaye Nimurodi, ari we wabanje kuba umunyambaraga mu isi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:11: 11.Misirayimu abyara Abaludi n’Abanami, n’Abalehabi n’Abanafutuhi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:12: 12.n’Abapatirusi n’Abakasiluhi (ari bo Abafilisitiya bakomotseho), n’Abakafutori.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:13: 13.Kanāni abyara imfura ye Sidoni na Heti,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:17: 17.Bene Shemu ni Elamu na Ashuri na Arupakisadi, na Ludi na Aramu na Usi, na Huli na Geteri na Mesheki.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:18: 18.Arupakisadi abyara Shela, Shela abyara Eberi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:19: 19.Eberi abyara abahungu babiri, umwe yitwaga Pelegi kuko mu minsi ye arimo isi yagabanijwe, kandi izina rya murumuna we ni Yokitani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:20: 20.Yokitani abyara Alimodadi na Shelefu, na Hasarumaveti na Yera,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:21: 21.na Hadoramu na Uzali na Dikila,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:22: 22.na Ebali na Abimayeli na Sheba,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:23: 23.na Ofiri na Havila na Yobabu. Abo bose bari abahungu ba Yokitani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:24: 24.Shemu yabyaye Arupakisadi, Arupakisadi abyara Shela.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:25: 25.Shela yabyaye Eberi, Eberi abyara Pelegi, Pelegi abyara Rewu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:26: 26.Rewu yabyaye Serugi, Serugu abyara Nahori, Nahori abyara Tera.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:27: 27.Tera yabyaye Aburamu (ari we Aburahamu).
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:28: 28.Bene Aburahamu ni Isaka na Ishimayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:29: 29.Izi ni zo mbyaro zabo. Imfura ya Ishimayeli ni Nebayoti, agakurikirwa na Kedari na Adibēli na Mibusamu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:30: 30.na Mishuma na Duma na Masa na Hadadi na Tema,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:31: 31.na Yeturi na Nafishi na Kedema. Abo ni bo bana ba Ishimayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:32: 32.Kandi abana ba Ketura inshoreke ya Aburahamu yabyaye Zimurani na Yokishani, na Medani na Midiyani, na Yishibaki na Shuwa. Kandi abahungu ba Yokishani ni Sheba na Dedani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:33: 33.Abahungu ba Midiyani ni Efa na Eferi, na Hanoki na Abida na Eluda. Abo bose bari abahungu ba Ketura.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:34: 34.Aburahamu abyara Isaka. Bene Isaka ni Esawu na Isirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:35: 35.Bene Esawu ni Elifazi na Reweli na Yewushi, na Yalamu na Kōra.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:36: 36.Bene Elifazi ni Temani na Omari na Sefi, na Gatamu na Kenazi, na Timuna na Amaleki.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:37: 37.Bene Reweli ni Nahati na Zera, na Shama na Miza.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:38: 38.Bene Seyiri ni Lotani na Shobali, na Sibeyoni na Ana, na Dishoni na Eseri na Dishani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:39: 39.Bene Lotani ni Hori na Homami, kandi Timuna yari mushiki wa Lotani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:40: 40.Bene Shobali ni Aliyani na Manahati, na Ebali na Shefi na Onamu. Bene Sibeyoni ni Ayiya na Ana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:41: 41.Mwene Ana ni Dishoni, na bene Dishoni ni Hamurani na Eshibani na Yitirani na Kerani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:42: 42.Bene Eseri ni Biluhani na Zāvani na Yakani. Bene Dishani ni Usi na Arani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:43: Abami n’abatware bo muri Edomu (Itang 36.31-43)43.Aba ni bo bami bategekaga igihugu cya Edomu, ari nta mwami wari wategeka Abisirayeli. Bela mwene Bewori, izina ry’umurwa we witwaga Dinihaba.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:44: 44.Bela aratanga, Yobabu mwene Zera w’i Bosira yima mu cyimbo cye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:45: 45.Yobabu aratanga, Hushamu wo mu gihugu cy’Abatemani yima mu cyimbo cye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:46: 46.Hushamu aratanga, Hadadi mwene Bedadi wanesheje Abamidiyani mu gihugu cy’i Mowabu, yima mu cyimbo cye, n’izina ry’umurwa we witwaga Aviti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:47: 47.Hadadi aratanga, Samula w’i Masireka yima mu cyimbo cye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:48: 48.Samula aratanga, Shawuli w’i Rehoboti yo ku ruzi yima mu cyimbo cye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:49: 49.Shawuli aratanga, Bālihanani mwene Akibori yima mu cyimbo cye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:50: 50.Bālihanani atanze Hadadi yima mu cyimbo cye, umurwa we witwaga Payi, (umugore we yitwaga Mehetabēli umukobwa wa Matiredi, umukobwa wa Mezahabu.)
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:51: 51.Hadadi na we aratanga. Aba ni bo batware ba Edomu: umutware Timuna n’umutware Aliya n’umutware Yeteti,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:52: 52.n’umutware Oholibama n’umutware Ela, n’umutware Pinoni
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:53: 53.n’umutware Kenazi, n’umutware Temani, n’umutware Mibusari,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:1:54: 54.n’umutware Magidiyeli n’umutware Iramu. Abo ni bo batware ba Edomu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:1: Abakomoka kuri Yuda mwene Yakobo1.Aba ni bo bahungu ba Isirayeli: Rubeni na Simiyoni na Lewi, na Yuda na Isakari na Zebuluni,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:2: 2.na Dani na Yosefu na Benyamini, na Nafutali na Gadi na Asheri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:3: 3.Bene Yuda ni Eri na Onani na Shela, abo uko ari batatu yababyaranye na Batishuwa Umunyakanānikazi. Kandi Eri imfura ya Yuda, yari mubi mu maso y’Uwiteka, aramwica.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:4: 4.Tamari umukazana we amubyaraho Perēsi na Zera. Abahungu ba Yuda bose bari batanu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:5: 5.Bene Perēsi ni Hesironi na Hamuli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:6: 6.Bene Zera ni Zimuri na Etani, na Hemani na Kalukoli na Dara, bose ni batanu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:7: 7.Bene Karumi ni Akani, wababazaga Isirayeli agacumura mu byashinganywe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:8: 8.Mwene Etani ni Azariya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:9: 9.Kandi bene Hesironi yabyaye ni Yeramēli na Ramu na Kelubayi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:10: 10.Ramu abyara Aminadabu, Aminadabu abyara Nahashoni umutware w’Abayuda.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:11: 11.Nahashoni abyara Salumoni, Salumoni abyara Bowazi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:12: 12.Bowazi abyara Obedi, Obedi abyara Yesayi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:13: 13.Yesayi abyara imfura ye Eliyabu, uw’ubuheta ni Abinadabu, uwa gatatu ni Shimeya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:14: 14.uwa kane ni Netanēli, uwa gatanu ni Radayi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:15: 15.uwa gatandatu ni Osemu, uwa karindwi ni Dawidi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:16: 16.Kandi bashiki babo ni aba: Seruya na Abigayili. Bene Seruya ni Abishayi na Yowabu na Asaheli, uko ari batatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:17: 17.Abigayili abyara Amasa, kandi se wa Amasa yari Yeteri w’Umwishimayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:18: 18.Kalebu mwene Hesironi abyarana abana n’umugore we Azuba no kuri Yeriyoti. Aba ni bo bahungu be: Yesheri na Shobabu na Aridoni.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:19: 19.Azuba apfuye Kalebu ashyingirwa Efurata, amubyaraho Huri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:20: 20.Huri abyara Uri, Uri abyara Besaleli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:21: 21.Hanyuma Hesironi ataha ku mukobwa wa Makiri se wa Gileyadi, amurongora amaze imyaka mirongo itandatu avutse, amubyaraho Segubu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:22: 22.Segubu abyara Yayiri, ari we wari ufite imidugudu makumyabiri n’itatu mu gihugu cy’i Galeyadi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:23: 23.Geshuri na Aramu babanyaga imidugudu ya Yayiri hamwe n’i Kenati n’ibirorero byaho, yose ni imidugudu mirongo itandatu. Aba bose ni bene Makiri se wa Gileyadi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:24: 24.Bukeye Hesironi apfiriye i Kalebu ya Efurata, umugore we Abiya inda yamusigiye ayibyaramo Ashihuri se wa Tekowa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:25: 25.Bene Yeramēli imfura ya Hesironi ni aba: uw’imfura ni Ramu, agakurikirwa na Buna na Oreni na Osemu na Ahiya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:26: 26.Kandi Yeramēli yari afite undi mugore witwaga Atara, uwo ni we nyina wa Onamu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:27: 27.Bene Ramu imfura ya Yeramēli ni Māsi na Yamini na Ekeri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:28: 28.Na bene Onamu ni Shamayi na Yada, bene Shamayi ni Nadabu na Abishuri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:29: 29.Na muka Abishuri yitwaga Abihayili, amubyaraho Ahubani na Molidi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:30: 30.Bene Nadabu ni Seledi na Apayimu, ariko Seledi apfa ari incike.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:31: 31.Mwene Apayimu ni Ishi, mwene Ishi ni Sheshani, mwene Sheshani ni Ahilayi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:32: 32.Bene Yada murumuna wa Shamayi ni Yeteri na Yonatani, Yeteri apfa ari incike.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:33: 33.Bene Yonatani ni Peleti na Zaza. Abo ni bo bene Yeramēli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:34: 34.Kandi Sheshani nta bahungu yari afite keretse abakobwa. Ariko yari afite umugaragu w’Umunyegiputa witwaga Yaruha,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:35: 35.ashyingira umukobwa we uwo mugaragu we Yaruha, amubyaraho Atayi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:36: 36.Atayi abyara Natani, Natani abyara Zabadi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:37: 37.Zabadi abyara Efulali, Efulali abyara Obedi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:38: 38.Obedi abyara Yehu, Yehu abyara Azariya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:39: 39.Azariya abyara Helesi, Helesi abyara Eleyasa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:40: 40.Eleyasa abyara Sisimayi, Sisimayi abyara Shalumu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:41: 41.Shalumu abyara Yekamiya, Yekamiya abyara Elishama.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:42: 42.Bene Kalebu murumuna wa Yeramēli, imfura ye ni Mesha ari we se wa Zifu, na bene Mesha se wa Heburoni.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:43: 43.Bene Heburoni ni Kōra na Tapuwa, na Rekemu na Shema.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:44: 44.Shema abyara Rahamu se wa Yorikeyamu, Rememu abyara Shamayi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:45: 45.Mwene Shamayi ni Mawoni, kandi Mawoni yari se wa Betisuri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:46: 46.Kandi Efa inshoreke ya Kalebu abyara Harani na Mosa na Gazezi, Harani abyara Gazezi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:47: 47.Bene Yahidayi ni Regemu na Yotamu na Geshani, na Peleti na Efa na Shāfi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:48: 48.Kandi Māka inshoreke ya Kalebu, abyara Sheberi na Tiruhana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:49: 49.Kandi abyara Shāfi se wa Madumana, na Sheva se wa Makubena n’uwa Gibeya. Kandi umukobwa wa Kalebu yari Akisa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:50: 50.Aba ni bo bene Kalebu mwene Huri imfura ya Efurata: Shobali se wa Kiriyatiyeyarimu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:51: 51.na Salima se wa Betelehemu, na Harefu se wa Betigaderi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:52: 52.Kandi Shobali se wa Kiriyatiyeyarimu yari afite abahungu, Harowe na Hasihamanahati.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:53: 53.Imbyaro za Kiriyatiyeyarimu ni Abayeteri n’Abaputi, n’Abashumati n’Abamishurayi, kuri abo ni ho Abasorati n’Abanyeshitawoli bakomotse.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:54: 54.Bene Salima ni Betelehemu n’Abanyanetofa na Atarotibetiyowabu, n’igice cy’Abamanahati n’Abasori.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:2:55: 55.Kandi imbyaro z’abanditsi babaga i Yabesi ni Abatirati n’Abashimeyati n’Abasukati. Abo ni bo Bakeni bakomotse kuri Hamati se w’umuryango wa Rekabu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:1: Abakomoka kuri Dawidi1.Aba ni bo bahungu ba Dawidi yabyariye i Heburoni: uw’imfura ni Amunoni umwana wa Ahinowamu w’Umunyayezerēlikazi, uw’ubuheta ni Daniyeli umwana wa Abigayili w’Umunyakarumelikazi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:2: 2.uwa gatatu ni Abusalomu umwana wa Māka umukobwa wa Talumayi umwami w’i Geshuri, uwa kane ni Adoniya umwana wa Hagiti,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:3: 3.uwa gatanu ni Shefatiya umwana wa Abitali, uwa gatandatu ni Itureyamu umwana w’umugore we Egila.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:4: 4.Abo uko ari batandatu yababyariye i Heburoni, kandi yamazeyo imyaka irindwi n’amezi atandatu ari ku ngoma. Naho i Yerusalemu yamazeyo imyaka mirongo itatu n’itatu ari ku ngoma.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:5: 5.Kandi aba ni bo yabyariye i Yerusalemu: Shimeya na Shobabu na Natani na Salomo, uko ari bane ni aba Batishuwa umukobwa wa Amiyeli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:6: 6.na Ibuhari na Elishama na Elifeleti,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:7: 7.na Noga na Nefegi na Yafiya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:8: 8.na Elishama na Eliyada na Elifeleti, uko ari icyenda.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:9: 9.Abo bose bari abahungu ba Dawidi hatagiyeho ab’abaja, kandi Tamari yari mushiki wabo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:10: 10.Umuhungu wa Salomo ni Rehobowamu, uwa Rehobowamu ni Abiya, uwa Abiya ni Asa, uwa Asa ni Yehoshafati.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:11: 11.Uwa Yehoshafati ni Yoramu, uwa Yoramu ni Ahaziya, uwa Ahaziya ni Yowasi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:12: 12.Uwa Yowasi ni Amasiya, uwa Amasiya ni Uziya, uwa Uziya ni Yotamu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:13: 13.Uwa Yotamu ni Ahazi, uwa Ahazi ni Hezekiya, uwa Hezekiya ni Manase.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:14: 14.Uwa Manase ni Amoni, uwa Amoni ni Yosiya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:15: 15.Bene Yosiya uw’impfura ni Yohanani, uwo ubuheta ni Yehoyakimu, uwa gatatu ni Sedekiya, uwa kane ni Shalumu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:16: 16.Mwene Yehoyakimu ni Yekoniya, uwa Yekoniya ni Sedekiya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:17: 17.Bene Yekoniya w’imbohe ni Sheyalutiyeli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:18: 18.na Malikiramu na Pedaya na Shenasari, na Yekamiya na Hoshama na Nedabiya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:19: 19.Bene Pedaya ni Zerubabeli na Shimeyi, bene Zerubabeli ni Meshulamu na Hananiya kandi Shelomiti yari mushiki wabo,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:20: 20.na Hashubu na Oheli na Berekiya, na Hasadiya na Yushabuhesedi, uko ari batanu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:21: 21.Bene Hananiya ni Pelatiya na Yeshaya, na bene Refaya na bene Arunani, na bene Obadiya na bene Shekaniya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:22: 22.Bene Shekaniya ni Shemaya, bene Shemaya ni Hatushi na Igali na Bariya, na Neyariya na Shafati, uko ari batandatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:23: 23.Bene Neyariya ni Eliyowenayi na Hizekiya na Azirikamu, uko ari batatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:3:24: 24.Bene Eliyowenayi ni Hodaviya na Eliyashibu na Pelaya, na Akubu na Yohanani na Delaya na Anani, uko ari barindwi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:1: Urundi rutonde rw’abakomoka kuri Yuda1.Bene Yuda ni Perēsi na Hesironi, na Karumi na Huri na Shobali.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:2: 2.Reyaya mwene Shobali abyara Yahati, Yahati abyara Ahumayi na Lahadi. Izo ni zo mbyaro z’Abasorati.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:3: 3.Aba ni bo bana ba se wa Etamu: Yezerēli na Ishuma na Idubashi, na mushiki wabo yitwaga Haseleluponi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:4: 4.na Penuweli se wa Gedori na Ezeri se wa Husha. Aba ni bo bahungu ba Huri, imfura ye ni Efurata se wa Betelehemu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:5: 5.Ashihuri se wa Tekowa yari afite abagore babiri, Hela na Nāra.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:6: 6.Nāra amubyaraho Ahuzamu na Heferi, na Temeni na Hāhashutari. Abo ni bo bahungu ba Nāra.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:7: 7.Bene Hela ni Sereti na Isuhari na Etunani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:8: 8.Hakosi abyara Anubu na Sobeba, n’imbyaro za Aharuheli mwene Haramu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:9: 9.Yabesi yarushaga bene se icyubahiro, kandi nyina yamwise Yabesi kuko yavuze ati “Namubyaranye agahinda.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:10: 10.Yabesi atakambira Imana ya Isirayeli ati “Icyampa ukampa umugisha rwose, ukāgura imbago yanjye kandi ukuboko kwawe kukabana nanjye, ukandinda ibyago ntibimbabaze.” Nuko Imana imuha ibyo yasabye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:11: 11.Kelubu murumuna wa Shuha abyara Mehiri se wa Eshitoni.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:12: 12.Eshitoni abyara Betirafa na Paseya, na Tehina se wa Irunahashi. Abo ni bo bantu ba Reka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:13: 13.Bene Kenazi ni Otiniyeli na Seraya, mwene Otiniyeli ni Hatati.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:14: 14.Meyonotayi abyara Ofura, na Seraya abyara Yowabu se wa Geharashimu, kuko bari abanyamyuga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:15: 15.Bene Kalebu mwene Yefune ni Iru, na Ela, na Nāmu, na bene Ela ni Kenazi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:16: 16.Bene Yehalelēli ni Zifu na Zifa, na Tiriya na Asarēli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:17: 17.Bene Ezira ni Yeteri na Meredi na Eferi na Yaloni, kandi abyara Miriyamu na Shamayi, na Ishuba se wa Eshitemowa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:18: 18.Umugore we w’Umuyudakazi abyara Yeredi se wa Gedori, na Heberi se wa Soko, na Yekutiyeli se wa Zanowa. Abo ni bo bahungu ba Bitiya umukobwa wa Farawo warongowe na Meredi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:19: 19.Abahungu ba muka Hodiya murumuna wa Nahamu, ni se wa Keyila w’Umugarumi na Eshitemowa w’Umunyamāka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:20: 20.Bene Shimoni ni Amunoni na Rina, na Benihanani na Tiloni. Bene Ishi ni Zoheti na Benizoheti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:21: 21.Bene Shela mwene Yuda ni Eri se wa Leka na Lāda se wa Maresha, n’imbyaro z’inzu y’ababohaga imyenda y’ibitare byiza, bo mu nzu ya Ashibeya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:22: 22.na Yokimu n’abagabo b’i Kozeba, na Yowasi na Sarafi batwaraga i Mowabu, na Yashubilehemu. Kandi ayo magambo ni aya kera.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:23: 23.Abo ni bo bari ababumbyi baturaga i Netayimu n’i Gedera, babanagayo n’umwami bakamukorera.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:24: Abakomoka kuri Simiyoni24.Bene Simiyoni ni Nemuweli na Yamini, na Yaribu na Zera na Shawuli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:25: 25.Umuhungu wa Shawuli ni Shalumu, mwene Shalumu ni Mibusamu, mwene Mibusamu ni Mishuma.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:26: 26.Mwene Mishuma ni Hamuweli, mwene Hamuweli ni Zakuri, mwene Zakuri ni Shimeyi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:27: 27.Shimeyi abyara abahungu cumi na batandatu n’abakobwa batandatu, ariko bene se ntibabyara abana benshi kandi umuryango wabo wose ntiwagwiriye nk’uw’Abayuda.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:28: 28.Kandi baturaga i Bērisheba n’i Molada n’i Hasarishuwali,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:29: 29.n’i Biluha na Esemu n’i Toladi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:30: 30.n’i Betuweli n’i Horuma n’i Sikulagi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:31: 31.n’i Betimarukaboti n’i Hasarisusimu, n’i Betibiri n’i Shārayimu. Iyo ni yo yari imidugudu yabo kugeza aho Dawidi yimiye ingoma.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:32: 32.N’ibirorero byabo ni Etamu na Ayini, na Rimoni na Tokeni na Ashani, byose uko ari bitanu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:33: 33.Ibirorero byabo byose byari bikikije iyo midugudu ukageza i Bāli. Aho ni ho baturaga kandi bamenyaga ibya ba sekuruza.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:34: 34.Meshobabu na Yamuleki na Yosha mwene Amasiya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:35: 35.na Yoweli na Yehu mwene Yoshibiya mwene Seraya mwene Asiyeli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:36: 36.na Eliyowenayi na Yākoba na Yeshohaya, na Asaya na Adiyeli na Yesimiyeli na Benaya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:37: 37.na Ziza mwene Shifi mwene Aloni, mwene Yedaya mwene Shimuri mwene Shemaya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:38: 38.Abo bavuzwe mu mazina bari abatware mu miryango yabo, kandi amazu ya ba sekuruza babo aragwira cyane.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:39: 39.Bajya aharasukirwa i Gedori iruhande rw’ikibaya rw’iburasirazuba, gushakira imikumbi yabo ubwatsi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:40: 40.Babona ubwatsi bwiza butoshye, kandi igihugu cyari kigari gifite amahoro n’ituze, kuko abari batuyeyo ubwa mbere bari Abahamu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:41: 41.Kandi abo banditswe amazina baje ku ngoma ya Hezekiya umwami w’Abayuda batera amahema yabo, Abameyunimu basanzeyo barabarimbura rwose kugeza n’ubu, bahindūra imisozi yabo bayituramo, kuko hari ubwatsi bw’imikumbi yabo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:42: 42.Kandi bamwe muri bo bo muri bene Simiyoni, abagabo magana atanu bajya ku musozi Seyiri, abatware babo ni Pelatiya na Neyariya na Refaya na Uziyeli, bene Ishi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:4:43: 43.Bica igice cy’Abamaleki cyacitse ku icumu, baturayo na bugingo n’ubu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:1: Abakomoka kuri Rubeni1.Rubeni yari imfura ya Isirayeli, ariko ubutware bwe bw’umwana w’imfura barabumwaka, kuko yashize isoni kuri muka se, babuha bene Yosefu mwene Isirayeli. Nyamara (Yosefu) ntiyari akwiriye gutangiririrwaho mu mubare w’amazina nk’uwavutse ari imfura.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:2: 2.Kandi Yuda yagwije amaboko muri bene se, kuri we hakomotse umwami. Ariko ubutware bw’umwana w’imfura bwari ubwa Yosefu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:3: 3.Bene Rubeni imfura ya Isirayeli ni Henoki na Palu, na Hesironi na Karumi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:4: 4.Mwene Yoweli ni Shemaya, mwene Shemaya ni Gogi, mwene Gogi ni Shimeyi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:5: 5.mwene Shimeyi ni Mika, mwene Mika ni Reyaya, mwene Reyaya ni Bāli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:6: 6.mwene Bāli ni Bēra, ni we Tigulatipilineseri umwami wa Ashuri yajyanye ho umunyago, ari we wari umutware w’Abarubeni.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:7: 7.Bene Bēra uko imiryango yabo iri, ni yo yanditswe mu bya ba sekuruza uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri, umukuru ni Yeyeli na Zekariya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:8: 8.na Bela mwene Azazi mwene Shema mwene Yoweli, waturaga muri Aroweri akageza i Nebo n’i Bālimeyoni.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:9: 9.Kandi agatura n’iburasirazuba akageza ahagana mu ishyamba, uhereye ku ruzi rwa Ufurate kuko imikumbi yabo yari igwiriye mu gihugu cy’i Galeyadi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:10: 10.Maze ku ngoma ya Sawuli barwana n’Abahagari barabica, baherako batura mu mahema yabo, bakwira igihugu cyose cy’iburasirazuba bw’i Galeyadi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:11: Abakomoka kuri Gadi11.Bene Gadi batura babitegeye, mu gihugu cy’i Bashani ukageza Saleka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:12: 12.Yoweli ni we wari mukuru, uwa kabiri ni Shafamu, na Yanayi na Shafati i Bashani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:13: 13.Na bene wabo bo mu mbyaro za ba sekuruza babo, Mikayeli na Meshulamu na Sheba, na Yorayi na Yakani na Ziya na Eberi, uko ari barindwi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:14: 14.Aba ni bo bene Abihayili mwene Huri mwene Yarowa, mwene Gileyadi mwene Mikayeli mwene Yeshishayi, mwene Yahudo mwene Buzi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:15: 15.Ahi mwene Abudiyeli mwene Guni, ni we wari umutware w’amazu ya ba sekuruza.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:16: 16.Abo baturaga i Galeyadi muri Bashani, mu midugudu yaho no mu bikingi byose by’i Sharoni ukageza aho bigarukira.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:17: 17.Abo bose barabazwe, uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri ku ngoma ya Yotamu umwami w’i Buyuda, no ku ngoma ya Yerobowamu umwami wa Isirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:18: 18.Muri bene Rubeni n’Abagadi n’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase, harimo abagabo b’intwari zibasha gutwara ingabo n’inkota no kurasanisha imiheto z’abahanga mu ntambara, zose zari ingabo inzovu enye n’ibihumbi bine na magana arindwi na mirongo itandatu, ni bo babashaga gutabara.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:19: 19.Barwana n’Abahagari na Yeturi na Nafishi na Nadabu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:20: 20.Bakirwana na bobaratabarwa, Abahagari n’abari kumwe na bo bose batangwa mu maboko y’Abarubeni n’Abagadi n’Abamanase, kuko batakambiye Imana muri iyo ntambara, ikemera guhendahendwa kuko bayiringiye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:21: 21.Maze banyaga amatungo yabo, ingamiya inzovu eshanu n’intama inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bitanu, n’indogobe ibihumbi bibiri n’abantu agahumbi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:22: 22.Benshi baguye mu ntambara kuko iyo ntambara yari ivuye ku Mana. Baherako batura muri icyo gihugu, kugeza igihe bajyaniwe ho iminyago.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:23: Abakomoka kuri Manase23.Ab’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase batura muri icyo gihugu, uhereye i Bashani ukageza i Bāliherumoni n’i Seniri no ku musozi wa Herumoni.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:24: 24.Aba ni bo bari abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza babo: Eferi na Ishi na Eliyeli na Aziriyeli, na Yeremiya na Hodaviya na Yahudiyeli. Bari abanyambaraga b’intwari b’ibirangirire n’abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza babo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:25: 25.Hanyuma bacumura ku Mana ya ba sekuruza babo, bakajya bararikira imana z’abanyamahanga bo muri icyo gihugu, abo Imana yabarimburiye imbere.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:26: 26.Hanyuma Imana ya Isirayeli ihata umutima wa Puli umwami wa Ashūri n’umutima wa Tigulatipilineseri umwami wa Ashūri, ajyana ho iminyago Abarubeni n’Abagadi n’ab’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase, abajyana i Hala n’i Habora n’i Hara, no ku mugezi w’i Gozani na bugingo n’ubu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:27: Abatambyi bakuru bakomoka kuri Lewi27.Bene Lewi ni Gerushoni na Kohati na Merari.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:28: 28.Bene Kohati ni Amuramu na Isuhari, na Heburoni na Uziyeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:29: 29.Bene Amuramu ni Aroni na Mose na Miriyamu. Bene Aroni ni Nadabu na Abihu, na Eleyazari na Itamari.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:30: 30.Eleyazari abyara Finehasi, Finehasi abyara Abishuwa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:31: 31.Abishuwa abyara Buki, Buki abyara Uzi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:32: 32.Uzi abyara Zerahiya, Zerahiya abyara Merayoti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:33: 33.Merayoti abyara Amariya, Amariya abyara Ahitubu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:34: 34.Ahitubu abyara Sadoki, Sadoki abyara Ahimāzi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:35: 35.Ahimāzi abyara Azariya, Azariya abyara Yohanani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:36: 36.Yohanani abyara Azariya, (ari we wakoraga umurimo w’ubutambyi mu nzu Salomo yubatse i Yerusalemu).
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:37: 37.Azariya abyara Amariya, Amariya abyara Ahitubu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:38: 38.Ahitubu abyara Sadoki, Sadoki abyara Shalumu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:39: 39.Shalumu abyara Hilukiya, Hilukiya abyara Azariya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:40: 40.Azariya abyara Seraya, Seraya abyara Yehosadaki.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:5:41: 41.Yehosadaki yajyagiye ari umunyagano, ubwo Uwiteka yanyagishaga Abayuda n’ab’i Yerusalemu Nebukadinezari.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:1: Abandi bakomoka kuri Lewi1.Bene Lewi ni Gerushomu na Kohati na Merari.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:2: 2.Aya ni yo mazina ya bene Gerushomu: Libuni na Shimeyi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:3: 3.Bene Kohati ni Amuramu na Isuhari, na Heburoni na Uziyeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:4: 4.Bene Merari ni Mahali na Mushi. Kandi iyi ni yo miryango y’Abalewi nk’uko amazu ya ba sekuruza yari ari.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:5: 5.Aba Gerushomu: umuhungu we ni Libuni, mwene Libuni ni Yahati, mwene Yahati ni Zima,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:6: 6.mwene Zima ni Yowa, mwene Yowa ni Ido, mwene Ido ni Zera, mwene Zera ni Yeyaterayi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:7: 7.Bene Kohati: umuhungu we ni Aminadabu, mwene Aminadabu ni Kōra, mwene Kōra ni Asiri,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:8: 8.mwene Asiri ni Elukana, mwene Elukana ni Ebiyasafu, mwene Ebiyasafu ni Asiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:9: 9.Mwene Asiri ni Tahati, mwene Tahati ni Uriyeli, mwene Uriyeli ni Uziya, mwene Uziya ni Shawuli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:10: 10.Bene Elukana ni Amasayi na Ahimoti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:11: 11.Ibya Elukana: bene Elukana, umuhungu we ni Zofayi, mwene Zofayi ni Nahati.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:12: 12.Mwene Nahati ni Eliyabu, mwene Eliyabu ni Yerohamu, mwene Yerohamu ni Elukana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:13: 13.Bene Samweli: imfura ye ni Yoweli, uw’ubuheta ni Abiya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:14: 14.Bene Merari ni Mahali, mwene Mahali ni Libuni, mwene Libuni ni Shimeyi, mwene Shimeyi ni Uza.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:15: 15.Mwene Uza ni Shimeya, mwene Shimeya ni Hagiya, mwene Hagiya ni Asaya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:16: 16.Abo ni bo Dawidi yashyize ku murimo wo kuririmba mu nzu y’Uwiteka, ubwo isanduku yari imaze gushyirwa mu buruhukiro,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:17: 17.bagakoreshereza indirimbo imbere y’ubuturo bw’Ihema ry’ibonaniro, kugeza aho Salomo yamariye kubaka inzu y’Uwiteka i Yerusalemu, bagakora umurimo wabo bakuranwa, uko ibihe byabo byari biri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:18: 18.Kandi aba ni bo bakoranaga n’abahungu babo: muri bene Kohati ni Hemani umuririmbyi mwene Yoweli, mwene Samweli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:19: 19.mwene Elukana, mwene Yerohamu, mwene Eliyeli, mwene Towa,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:20: 20.mwene Sufi, mwene Elukana, mwene Mahati, mwene Amasayi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:21: 21.mwene Elukana, mwene Yoweli, mwene Azariya, mwene Zefaniya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:22: 22.mwene Tahati, mwene Asiri, mwene Ebiyasafu, mwene Kōra,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:23: 23.mwene Isuhari, mwene Kohati, mwene Lewi, mwene Isirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:24: 24.Na murumuna we Asafu, wahagararaga iburyo bwe, ari we Asafu mwene Berekiya, mwene Shimeya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:25: 25.mwene Mikayeli, mwene Bāseya, mwene Malikiya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:26: 26.mwene Etuni, mwene Zera, mwene Adaya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:27: 27.mwene Etani, mwene Zima, mwene Shimeyi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:28: 28.mwene Yahati, mwene Gerushomu, mwene Lewi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:29: 29.Kandi ibumoso bwabo hari bene wabo bene Merari: Etani mwene Kishi, mwene Abudi, mwene Maluki,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:30: 30.mwene Hashabiya, mwene Amasiya, mwene Hilukiya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:31: 31.mwene Amusi, mwene Bani, mwene Shemeri,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:32: 32.mwene Mahali, mwene Mushi, mwene Merari, mwene Lewi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:33: 33.Kandi bene wabo Abalewi, bashyiriweho gukora umurimo wose wo mu buturo bw’inzu y’Imana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:34: 34.Ariko Aroni n’abahungu be batambiraga ku gicaniro cy’ibitambo byoswa no ku gicaniro cyo koserezaho imibavu, bagakora imirimo yose y’Ahera cyane, bagahongerera Abisirayeli nk’ibyo Mose umugaragu w’Imana yategetse byose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:35: 35.Aba ni bo bene Aroni: umuhungu we ni Eleyazari, mwene Eleyazari ni Finehasi, mwene Finehasi ni Abishuwa,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:36: 36.mwene Abishuwa ni Buki, mwene Buki ni Uzi, mwene Uzi ni Zerahiya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:37: 37.mwene Zerahiya ni Merayoti, mwene Merayoti ni Amariya, mwene Amariya ni Ahitubu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:38: 38.mwene Ahitubu ni Sadoki, mwene Sadoki ni Ahimāzi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:39: Imidugudu yahawe abakomoka kuri Lewi39.Kandi izi ni zo nturo bagabanijwe zo kubamo uko ingando zabo zari ziri: bene Aroni bo mu mazu y’Abakohati (kuko umugabane wa mbere wari uwabo),
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:40: 40.babaha i Heburoni mu gihugu cy’i Buyuda n’ibikingi byaho by’impande zose,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:41: 41.ariko imirima yo ku mudugudu n’ibirorero byawo babiha Kalebu mwene Yefune.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:42: 42.Kandi bene Aroni babaha imidugudu y’ubuhungiro, i Heburoni n’i Libuna n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Yatiri na Eshitemowa n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:43: 43.n’i Hileni n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Debira n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:44: 44.na Ashani n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Betishemeshi n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:45: 45.n’iyo mu muryango w’Ababenyamini, i Geba n’ibikingi byaho, na Alemeti n’ibikingi byaho, na Anatoti n’ibikingi byaho. Imidugudu yabo yose uko yagabanijwe mu miryango yabo, yari cumi n’itatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:46: 46.Kandi bene Kohati bandi bagabanirizwa umugabane mu mazu y’umuryango wa Efurayimu, no mu gice cy’umuryango wa Manase. Yose ni imidugudu icumi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:47: 47.Bene Gerushomu nk’uko imbyaro zabo zari ziri, bahabwa imidugudu cumi n’itatu itanzwe n’umuryango wa Isakari n’uwa Asheri, n’uwa Nafutali n’uwa Manase i Bashani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:48: 48.Bene Merari nk’uko imbyaro zabo zari ziri, bagabanirizwa imigabane mu muryango wa Rubeni n’uwa Gadi n’uwa Zebuluni, imidugudu cumi n’ibiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:49: 49.Abisirayeli baha Abalewi iyo midugudu n’ibikingi byayo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:50: 50.Nuko batanga imigabane y’imidugudu yo mu muryango w’Abayuda, n’iyo mu muryango w’Abasimeyoni, n’iyo mu muryango w’Ababenyamini, ari yo iyo ivuzwe mu mazina.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:51: 51.Kandi bamwe bo mu mazu ya bene Kohati, bari bafite imidugudu n’ingabano zayo yo mu muryango wa Efurayimu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:52: 52.Babaha n’imidugudu y’ubuhungiro: i Shekemu mu gihugu cy’imisozi ya Efurayimu n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Gezeri n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:53: 53.n’i Yokimeyamu n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Betihoroni n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:54: 54.na Ayaloni n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Gatirimoni n’ibikingi byaho.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:55: 55.Kandi n’iyo mu gice cy’umuryango wa Manase: Aneri n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Bileyamu n’ibikingi byaho, ngo ibe iy’abasigaye b’inzu ya bene Kohati.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:56: 56.Bene Gerushomu bahabwa imidugudu yo mu midugudu y’inzu y’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase: i Golani muri Bashani n’ibikingi byaho, na Ashitaroti n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:57: 57.n’iyo mu muryango wa Isakari: i Kedeshi n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Daberati n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:58: 58.n’i Ramoti n’ibikingi byaho, na Anemu n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:59: 59.n’iyo mu muryango wa Asheri: i Mashali n’ibikingi byaho, na Abudoni n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:60: 60.n’i Hukoki n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Rehobu n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:61: 61.n’iyo mu muryango wa Nafutali: i Kedeshi y’i Galilaya n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Hamoni n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Kiriyatayimu n’ibikingi byaho.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:62: 62.Abandi Balewi bene Merari bahawe imidugudu yo mu muryango wa Zebuluni: i Rimoni n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Tabora n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:63: 63.kandi hakurya ya Yorodani iburasirazuba hateganye n’i Yeriko, bahawe imidugudu yo mu muryango wa Rubeni: i Beseri ho mu butayu n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Yahazi n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:64: 64.n’i Kedemoti n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Mefāti n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:65: 65.n’iyo mu muryango wa Gadi: i Ramoti y’i Galeyadi n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Mahanayimu n’ibikingi byaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:6:66: 66.n’i Heshiboni n’ibikingi byaho, n’i Yazeri n’ibikingi byaho.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:1: Abakomoka kuri Isakari1.Bene Isakari ni Tola na Puwa, na Yashubu na Shimuroni, ni bane.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:2: 2.Bene Tola ni Uzi na Refaya na Yeriyeli, na Yahumayi na Ibusamu na Shemweli. Abatware b’inzu ya sekuruza Tola bari abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari mu bihe byabo, ku ngoma ya Dawidi umubare wabo bari inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bibiri na magana atandatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:3: 3.Bene Uzi ni Izurahiya, bene Izurahiya ni Mikayeli na Obadiya, na Yoweli na Ishiya. Uko ari batanu bose bari abatware.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:4: 4.Kandi muri bo, uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri ukurikije amazu ya ba sekuruza, harimo imitwe y’ingabo zo kurwana intambara zose zari inzovu eshatu n’ibihumbi bitandatu, kuko bari bafite abagore benshi n’abana b’abahungu benshi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:5: 5.Kandi bene wabo bo mu miryango yose ya Abisakari, abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari uko banditswe mu gitabo cyo kuvuka kwabo, bari inzovu munani n’ibihumbi birindwi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:6: Abakomoka kuri Benyamini6.Bene Benyamini ni Bela na Bekeri na Yediyayeli, ni batatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:7: 7.Bene Bela ni Esiboni na Uzi na Uziyeli, na Yerimoti na Iri, ni batanu. Abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza bari abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari, babazwe uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri, baba inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bibiri na mirongo itatu na bane.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:8: 8.Bene Bekeri ni Zimira na Yowasi na Eliyezeri, na Eliyowenayi na Omuri na Yerimoti, na Abiya na Anatoti na Alemeti. Abo bose bari bene Bekeri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:9: 9.Babazwe uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri bakurikirana, abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza babo bari abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari inzovu ebyiri na magana abiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:10: 10.Nwene Yediyayeli ni Biluhani, bene Biluhani ni Yewushi na Benyamini na Ehudi na Kenāna, na Zetani na Tarushishi na Ahishahari.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:11: 11.Abo bose bari bene Yediyayeli, uko abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza babo bari bari. Bari abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari inzovu imwe n’ibihumbi birindwi na magana abiri babashaga gutabara.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:12: 12.Shupimu na Hupimu bari bene Iri, Hushimu yari mwene Aheri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:13: Abakomoka kuri Nafutali13.Bene Nafutali ni Yahisēli na Guni na Yeseri na Shalumu, abahungu ba Biluha.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:14: Abakomoka kuri Manase14.Bene Manase ni Asiriyeli wabyawe n’umugore we, (inshoreke ye Umunyaramukazi ni yo yabyaye Makiri se wa Gileyadi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:15: 15.Makiri arongora umugore kwa Hupimu na Shupimu, murumuna we yari Māka). Umuhungu we wa kabiri witwaga Selofehadi, Selofehadi yabyaye abakobwa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:16: 16.Māka muka Makiri abyara umwana w’umuhungu amwita Pereshi, murumuna we yitwaga Shereshi kandi n’abahungu be ni Ulamu na Rakemu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:17: 17.Mwene Ulamu ni Bedani. Abo ni bo bari bene Gileyadi mwene Makiri mwene Manase.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:18: 18.Mushiki we Hamoleketi abyara Ishihodi na Abiyezeri na Mahila.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:19: 19.Bene Shemida ni Ahiyani na Shekemu, na Likuhi na Aniyamu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:20: Abakomoka kuri Efurayimu20.Bene Efurayimu ni Shutela, mwene Shutela ni Beredi, mwene Beredi ni Tahati, mwene Tahati ni Eleyada, mwene Eleyada ni Tahati.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:21: 21.Mwene Tahati ni Zabadi, mwene Zabadi ni Shutela na Ezeri na Eleyada, bishwe n’Abanyagati bavukiye muri icyo gihugu kuko bamanuwe no kunyaga inka zabo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:22: 22.Maze Efurayimu se amara iminsi myinshi arira, bene se baza kumumara umubabaro.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:23: 23.Bukeye ataha ku mugore we asama inda, abyara umwana w’umuhungu amwita Beriya, kuko urubyaro rwe rwagize ibyago.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:24: 24.(Kandi umukobwa we yitwaga Shēra, ari we wubatse i Betihoroni yo hepfo n’iyo haruguru, na Uzenishēra).
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:25: 25.Umuhungu we yari Refa na Reshefu na Tela umuhungu we, mwene Tela ni Tahani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:26: 26.Mwene Tahani ni Lādani, mwene Lādani ni Amihudi, mwene Amihudi ni Elishama.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:27: 27.Mwene Elishama ni Nuni, mwene Nuni ni Yosuwa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:28: 28.Kandi gakondo yabo n’inturo zabo byari i Beteli n’imidugudu yaho, iburasirazuba n’i Nārani n’iburengerazuba n’i Gezeri n’imidugudu yaho, kandi n’i Shekemu n’imidugudu yaho ukageza Aza n’imidugudu yaho.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:29: 29.Kandi no ku ngabano z’Abamanase: i Betisheyani n’imidugudu yaho, n’i Tānaki n’imidugudu yaho, n’i Megido n’imidugudu yaho, n’i Dori n’imidugudu yaho. Muri iyo midugudu, bene Yosefu mwene Isirayeli ni ho babaga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:30: Abakomoka kuri Asheri30.Bene Asheri ni Imuna na Ishiva na Ishivi, na Beriya na mushiki wabo Sera.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:31: 31.Bene Beriya ni Heberi na Malikiyeli se wa Biruzawiti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:32: 32.Heberi yabyaye Yafuleti na Shomeri, na Hotamu na mushiki wabo Shuwa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:33: 33.Bene Yafuleti ni Pasaki na Bimuhali na Ashuvati. Abo ni bo bari abana ba Yafuleti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:34: 34.Bene Shemeri ni Ahi na Rohuga, na Yehuba na Aramu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:35: 35.Kandi bene Helemu murumuna we ni Sofa na Imuna, na Sheleshi na Amali.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:36: 36.Bene Sofa ni Suwa na Haruneferi, na Shuwali na Beri na Imura,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:37: 37.na Beseri na Hodi na Shama, na Shilusha na Yitirani na Bēra.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:38: 38.Bene Yeteri ni Yefune na Pisipa na Ara.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:39: 39.Bene Ula ni Ara na Haniyeli na Risiya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:7:40: 40.Abo bose bari bene Asheri n’abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza, abagabo batowe b’abanyambaraga b’intwari, aba mbere mu batware. Kandi umubare wabo wabazwe uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri ngo bakore umurimo wo kurwana intambara, bari abagabo inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bitandatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:1: Urundi rutonde rw’abakomoka kuri Benyamini1.Benyamini yabyaye imfura ye Bela, n’uw’ubuheta Ashibeli, n’uwa gatatu Ahara,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:2: 2.n’uwa kane Noha, n’uwa gatanu Rafa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:3: 3.Na Bela yari afite abahungu: Adari na Gera na Abihudi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:4: 4.na Abishuwa na Nāmani na Ahowa,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:5: 5.na Gera na Shefufani na Huramu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:6: 6.Aba ni bo bene Ehudi, bari abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza b’abaturage b’i Geba, bukeye babajyana ho iminyago i Manahati.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:7: 7.Kandi Nāmani na Ahiya na Gera na bo abajyana ho iminyago, kandi abyara Uza na Ahihudi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:8: 8.Shaharayimu abyarira abana mu gihugu cy’i Mowabu, amaze kwirukana abagore be Hushimu na Bāra.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:9: 9.Abyarana n’umugore we Hodeshi, Yobabu na Sibiya na Mesha na Malukamu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:10: 10.na Yewusi na Shakiya na Miruma. Abo ni bo bari abahungu be, abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:11: 11.Kandi abyarana na Hushimu, Abitubu na Elipāli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:12: 12.Bene Elipāli ni Eberi na Mishamu na Shemedi, ari we wubatse Ono na Lodi n’imidugudu yaho,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:13: 13.na Beriya na Shema, ari bo bari abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza b’abaturage ba Ayaloni birukanye abaturage b’i Gati,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:14: 14.na Ahiyo na Shashaki na Yeremoti,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:15: 15.na Zebadiya na Aradi na Ederi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:16: 16.na Mikayeli na Ishipa na Yoha bene Beriya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:17: 17.na Zebadiya na Meshulamu, na Hizuki na Heberi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:18: 18.na Ishimerayi na Izuliya, na Yobabu bene Elipāli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:19: 19.na Yakimu na Zikiri na Zabudi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:20: 20.na Eliyenayi na Siletayi na Eliyeli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:21: 21.na Adaya na Beraya, na Shimurati bene Shimeyi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:22: 22.na Ishupani na Eberi na Eliyeli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:23: 23.na Abudoni na Zikiri na Hanāni,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:24: 24.na Hananiya na Elamu na Anitotiya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:25: 25.na Ifudeya na Penuweli, bene Shashaki,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:26: 26.na Shamusherayi na Shehariya na Ataliya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:27: 27.na Yāreshiya na Eliya na Zikiri bene Yerohamu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:28: 28.Abo ni bo bari abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza kurangiza ibihe byabo byose. Bari abagabo bakomeye kandi babaga i Yerusalemu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:29: 29.Kandi Yeyeli se wa Gibeyoni yaturaga i Gibeyoni. Umugore we yitwaga Māka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:30: 30.Umuhungu we w’imfura ni Abudoni, agakurikirwa na Suri na Kishi na Bāli na Nadabu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:31: 31.na Gedori na Ahiyo na Zekeri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:32: 32.Mikuloti abyara Shimeya. Abo na bo baturanaga na bene se i Yerusalemu, bateganye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:33: Abakomoka kuri Sawuli (1 Ngoma 9.39-44)33.Kandi Neri abyara Kishi, Kishi abyara Sawuli, Sawuli abyara Yonatani na Malikishuwa, na Abinadabu na Eshibāli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:34: 34.Umuhungu wa Yonatani ni Meribāli, Meribububāli abyara Mika.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:35: 35.Bene Mika ni Pitoni na Meleki, na Tareya na Ahazi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:36: 36.Ahazi abyara Yehoyada, Yehoyada abyara Alemeti na Azimaveti na Zimuri, Zimuri abyara Mosa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:37: 37.Mosa abyara Bineya. Umuhungu we ni Rafa, mwene Rafa ni Eleyasa, mwene Eleyasa ni Aseli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:38: 38.Aseli yari afite abahungu batandatu amazina yabo ni aya: Azirikamu na Bokeru na Ishimayeli, na Sheyariya na Obadiya na Hanāni. Abo bose ni bene Aseli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:39: 39.Bene Esheki murumuna we ni Ulamu imfura ye, uw’ubuheta ni Yewushi, uwa gatatu ni Elifeleti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:8:40: 40.Bene Ulamu bari abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari b’abarashi, bari bafite abahungu benshi n’abuzukuru, bari ijana na mirongo itanu. Abo bose bari ab’abahungu ba Benyamini.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:1: 1.Nuko Abisirayeli bose barabarwa uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri, kandi byanditswe mu gitabo cy’abami b’Abisirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:2:
Abari batuye i Yerusalemu
Abayuda bajyanwa ho iminyago i Babuloni ku bw’igicumuro cyabo.2.Ababanje gutura muri gakondo yabo mu midugudu yabo ni aba: Abisirayeli n’abatambyi, n’Abalewi n’Abanetinimu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:3: 3.Kandi muri Yerusalemu haturagamo bamwe b’Abayuda n’ab’Ababenyamini, n’ab’Abefurayimu n’ab’Abamanase.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:4: 4.Utayi mwene Amihudi mwene Omuri, mwene Imuri mwene Bani wo mu bana ba Perēsi mwene Yuda.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:5: 5.N’abo mu Banyashilo, uw’imfura ni Asaya n’abahungu be.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:6: 6.N’abo muri bene Zera ni Yeweli, na bene wabo magana atandatu na mirongo urwenda.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:7: 7.N’abo muri bene Benyamini ni Salu mwene Meshulamu, mwene Hodaviya mwene Hasenuwa,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:8: 8.na Ibuneya mwene Yerohamu, na Ela mwene Uzi mwene Mikiri, na Meshulamu mwene Shefatiya, mwene Reweli, mwene Ibuniya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:9: 9.na bene wabo uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri, ni magana urwenda na mirongo itanu na batandatu. Abo bagabo bose bari abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza uko yari ari.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:10: 10.Kandi abo mu batambyi ni Yedaya na Yehoyaribu na Yakini,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:11: 11.na Azariya mwene Hilukiya, mwene Meshulamu, mwene Sadoki, mwene Merayoti, mwene Ahitubu umutware w’inzu y’Imana,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:12: 12.na Adaya mwene Yerohamu, mwene Pashuri, mwene Malikiya, na Māsayi mwene Adiyeli, mwene Yahuzera, mwene Meshulamu, mwene Meshilemiti, mwene Imeri,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:13: 13.na bene wabo abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza babo igihumbi na magana arindwi na mirongo itandatu, abagabo b’abahanga bashobora gukora umurimo w’inzu y’Imana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:14: 14.Kandi abo mu Balewi ni Shemaya mwene Hashubu, mwene Azirikamu, mwene Hashabiya wo muri bene Merari,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:15: 15.na Bakibakari na Hereshi na Galali, na Mataniya mwene Mika, mwene Zikiri, mwene Asafu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:16: 16.na Obadiya mwene Shemaya, mwene Galali, mwene Yedutuni, na Berekiya mwene Asa, mwene Elukana baturaga mu birorero by’Abanyanetofa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:17: 17.Abakumirizi ni Shalumu na Akubu, na Talimoni na Ahimani na bene wabo, Shalumu ni we wari mukuru.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:18: 18.Kera barindaga irembo ry’umwami ry’iburasirazuba, ni bo bari abakumirizi b’ingando y’Abalewi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:19: 19.Shalumu mwene Kore, mwene Ebiyasafu, mwene Kōra na bene wabo b’inzu ya sekuruza we. Abakōra ni bo basohozaga umurimo w’ubukumirizi w’inzugi z’ihema, kandi ba sekuruza babo ni bo bategekaga ingando y’Uwiteka bakaba abakumirizi b’irembo ryayo,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:20: 20.na Finehasi mwene Eleyazari ari we wabategekaga kera, kandi Uwiteka yabanaga na we.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:21: 21.Zekariya mwene Meshelemiya, ni we wari umukumirizi w’irembo ry’Ihema ry’ibonaniro.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:22: 22.Abo bose batoranirijwe kuba abakumirizi b’amarembo bari magana abiri na cumi na babiri, kandi babarirwaga mu birorero byabo uko kuvuka kwabo kwari kuri, mu birorero byabo. Ni bo Dawidi na Samweli bamenya, bashyizeho mu mirimo yabo itegetswe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:23: 23.Nuko bo n’abana babo baba ku murimo wo kurinda amarembo y’inzu y’Uwiteka, ari yo nzu y’ihema, bakajya ibihe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:24: 24.Abakumirizi babaga ku mpande uko ari enye, iburasirazuba n’iburengerazuba n’ikasikazi n’ikusi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:25: 25.Kandi bene wabo bo mu birorero byabo, bari abo kujya baza uko iminsi irindwi yashiraga bakabana na bo,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:26: 26.kuko abakumirizi bakuru bane b’Abalewi babaga ku murimo ntibakurwe, ari bo batwara ibyumba n’ububiko byo mu nzu y’Imana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:27: 27.Bararaga bakikije inzu y’Imana, kuko ari bo bahawe umurimo wo kuyirinda no kuyikingura uko bukeye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:28: 28.Kandi bamwe muri bo babitswaga ibintu bikoreshwa, kuko mu icyurwa ryabyo no mu isohorwa ryabyo byabarwaga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:29: 29.Kandi bamwe muri bo bashyizweho umurimo wo kurinda ibintu, n’ibintu byose by’Ahera, n’ifu y’ingezi na vino n’amavuta, n’icyome n’imibavu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:30: 30.Kandi bamwe mu bana b’abatambyi batunganyaga imibavu, bakayivanga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:31: 31.Matitiya wo mu Balewi, imfura ya Shalumu Umukōra, ni we wari ufite umurimo wo gutegeka ibintu byakarangwaga ku byuma.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:32: 32.Kandi bamwe muri bene wabo b’Abakohati, ni bo bategekaga imitsima yo kumurikwa imbere y’Imana, bakayitegura uko isabato yatahaga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:33: 33.Kandi abo ni bo baririmbyi, abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza b’Abalewi, babaga muri ibyo byumba ntibagire undi murimo bakora, kuko bakoraga umurimo wabo ku manywa na nijoro.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:34: 34.Abo ni bo bari abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza b’Abalewi, uko babyaranye, abagabo bakomeye babaga i Yerusalemu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:35: Amasekuruza y’Umwami Sawuli n’abamukomotseho (1 Ngoma 8.29-38)35.Yeyeli se wa Gibeyoni yabaga i Gibeyoni. Umugore we yitwaga Māka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:36: 36.Umuhungu we w’imfura ni Abudoni, agakurikirwa na Suri na Kishi, na Bāli na Neri na Nadabu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:37: 37.na Gedori na Ahiyo, na Zekariya na Mikuloti,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:38: 38.Mikuloti abyara Shimeyamu. Abo na bo baturana na bene wabo i Yerusalemu, bateganye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:39: 39.Neri abyara Kishi, Kishi abyara Sawuli. Sawuli abyara Yonatani na Malikishuwa, na Abinadabu na Eshibāli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:40: 40.Mwene Yonatani ni Meribubāli, Meribubāli abyara Mika.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:41: 41.Bene Mika ni Pitoni na Meleki, na Tahureya na Ahazi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:42: 42.Ahazi abyara Yara, Yara abyara Alemeti na Azimaveti na Zimuri, Zimuri abyara Mosa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:43: 43.Mosa abyara Bineya, mwene Bineya ni Refaya, mwene Refaya ni Eleyasa, mwene Eleyasa ni Aseli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:9:44: 44.Aseli yari afite abahungu batandatu, amazina yabo ni aya: Azirikamu na Bokeru na Ishimayeli, na Sheyariya na Obadiya na Hanāni. Abo ni bo bene Aseli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:1: Gupfa kwa Sawuli (1 Sam 31.1-13)1.Hariho ubwo Abafilisitiya barwanije Abisirayeli, Abisirayeli barabahunga batsindirwa ku musozi w’i Gilibowa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:2: 2.Abafilisitiya basendekereza Sawuli n’abahungu be, bica Yonatani na Abinadabu na Malikishuwa bene Sawuli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:3: 3.Intambara isumbiriza Sawuli, abarashi bamugeraho ariheba cyane.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:4: 4.Sawuli ni ko kubwira umutwaje intwaro ati “Kura inkota yawe uyinsogote, bariya batakebwe bataza banshinyagurira.” Ariko umutwaje intwaro aranga kuko yatinye cyane, ni cyo cyatumye Sawuli yenda inkota ye akayishitaho.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:5: 5.Umutwaje intwaro abonye ko Sawuli apfuye, na we yishita ku ye nkota arapfa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:6: 6.Uko ni ko Sawuli yatanze, n’abahungu be uko ari batatu, n’abo mu nzu ye bose bagwa hamwe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:7: 7.Maze Abisirayeli bari mu kibaya bose babonye ko abandi bahunze, kandi ko Sawuli n’abahungu be bapfuye, bata imidugudu yabo barahunga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:8: 8.Abafilisitiya baraza bayibamo. Bukeye bwaho Abafilisitiya baje gucuza abapfu, basanga Sawuli n’abahungu be baraguye ku musozi w’i Gilibowa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:9: 9.Baramucuza bajyana igihanga cye n’intwaro ze, batuma mu gihugu cy’Abafilisitiya gihereranye na ho, ngo bazamamaze izo nkuru ku bigirwamana byabo no mu bantu babo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:10: 10.Intwaro ze bazishyira mu ngoro y’imana zabo, igihanga cye bakimanika mu ngoro ya Dagoni.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:11: 11.Nuko ab’i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi bose, bumvise ibyo Abafilisitiya bagiriye Sawuli byose,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:12: 12.ab’intwari bose barahaguruka, bakurayo intumbi ya Sawuli n’intumbi z’abahungu be bazizana i Yabeshi, bahamba amagufwa yabo munsi y’umwela w’i Yabeshi, baherako biyiriza ubusa iminsi irindwi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:13: 13.Uko ni ko Sawuli yatanze azize gucumura yacumuye ku Uwiteka, kuko atitondeye ijambo ry’Uwiteka, kandi kuko yashikishije umushitsi ngo amuhanuze,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:10:14: 14.ntahanuze Uwiteka. Ni cyo cyatumye amutangisha, ubwami akabugabira Dawidi mwene Yesayi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:1: Abisirayeli bimika Dawidi (2 Sam.5.1-10)1.Bukeye Abisirayeli bose bateranira aho Dawidi yari ari i Heburoni baravuga bati “Umva turi amaraso yawe, turi ubura bwawe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:2: 2.Mu bihe bya kera ubwo Sawuli yari umwami, ni wowe watabazaga Abisirayeli ukabataburura, kandi Uwiteka Imana yawe yarakubwiye iti ‘Ni wowe uzaragira ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli’. Kandi iti ‘Uzaba umugaba w’ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli.’ ”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:3: 3.Nuko abakuru ba Isirayeli bose basanga umwami i Heburoni, ahasezeranira na bo imbere y’Uwiteka isezerano, bimikisha Dawidi amavuta ngo abe umwami wa Isirayeli, nk’uko Uwiteka yavugiye muri Samweli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:4: 4.Hanyuma Dawidi n’Abisirayeli bose bajya i Yerusalemu (ahitwa i Yebusi), kandi Abayebusi ni bo bari abaturage bo muri icyo gihugu bari basanzwemo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:5: 5.Ab’i Yebusi babwira Dawidi bati “Hano ntabwo uzahamenera.” Ariko Dawidi ahindūra igihome gikomeye cya Siyoni, ari ho habaye ururembo rwa Dawidi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:6: 6.Ubwo Dawidi yaravuze ati “Uri bubanze kunesha Abayebusi, ni we uzaba umutware n’umugaba”. Maze Yowabu mwene Seruya aba ari we ubanza kuhamenera, aba umugaba w’ingabo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:7: 7.Dawidi atura muri icyo gihome gikomeye, ari cyo cyatumye bacyita ururembo rwa Dawidi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:8: 8.Yubaka umudugudu impande zarwo zose, uhereye i Milo n’impande zose. Yowabu na we asana ibindi bice by’umudugudu bisigaye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:9: 9.Maze Dawidi akajya arushaho gukomera, kuko Uwiteka Nyiringabo yari kumwe na we.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:10: Intwari za Dawidi (2 Sam 23.8-39)10.Aba ni bo bari bakomeye mu ntwari Dawidi yari afite, ni bo bafatanije na we kwerekana imbaraga zabo mu bwami bwe, bagafatanya n’Abisirayeli bose kumwimika nk’uko Uwiteka yavuze ku Bisirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:11: 11.Ngaba abagabo b’intwari Dawidi yari afite, uko umubare wabo wari uri: Yashobeyamu umwana w’Umuhakimoni, umutware w’ab’intore mirongo itatu. Yabanguye icumu rye kurwanya abantu magana atatu, abicira icyarimwe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:12: 12.Akurikirwa na Eleyazari mwene Dodo w’Umwahohi, yari uwo muri abo bagabo b’intwari batatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:13: 13.Uwo yari kumwe na Dawidi i Pasidamimu, ubwo Abafilisitiya bari bateraniyeyo ngo barwane, maze abantu bahunga Abafilisitiya. Aho hari umurima warimo sayiri nyinshi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:14: 14.Ariko bo bahagarara hagati muri uwo murima, barawurinda bica abo Bafilisitiya, Uwiteka abakirisha kunesha gukomeye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:15: 15.Abatatu kuri ba bandi mirongo itatu baramanuka basanga Dawidi ku rutare mu buvumo bwa Adulamu. Ingabo z’Abafilisitiya zari zigerereje mu kibaya cy’Abarafa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:16: 16.Ubwo Dawidi yari mu gihome, kandi abanyagihome cy’Abafilisitiya bari i Betelehemu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:17: 17.Dawidi akumbuye aravuga ati “Icyampa nkabona unsomya ku mazi y’iriba ryo ku irembo ry’i Betelehemu.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:18: 18.Maze abo batatu batwaranira mu ngabo z’Abafilisitiya, bavoma amazi mu iriba ryo ku irembo ry’i Betelehemu, barayajyana bayashyira Dawidi. Ariko Dawidi yanga kuyanywaho, ahubwo ayabyarira imbere y’Uwiteka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:19: 19.Aravuga ati “Imana yanjye indinde kuba nakora ntyo! Ndebe nywe amaraso y’aba bagabo bahaze amagara yabo!” Kuko bayazanye bihaze, ni cyo cyatumye yanga kuyanywa. Ibyo ni byo byakozwe n’abo bagabo b’intwari uko ari batatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:20: 20.Abishayi murumuna wa Yowabu ni we wari umutware w’abatatu, kuko yabanguye icumu rye kurwana n’abantu magana atatu akabica, akamamara muri abo batatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:21: 21.Muri abo batatu ni we wari ufite icyubahiro kurusha abandi babiri, ahinduka umutware wabo. Ariko ntiyahwanye n’abatatu ba mbere.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:22: 22.Benaya mwene Yehoyada umwana w’umugabo w’intwari w’i Kabusēli, yari yarakoze ibikomeye. Ni we wishe bene Ariyeli w’i Mowabu bombi, kandi aramanuka yicira intare mu isenga mu gihe cya shelegi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:23: 23.Yishe n’umugabo w’Umunyegiputa muremure cyane, uburebure bwe bwari mikono itanu. Uwo Munyegiputa yari yitwaje injunga y’icumu, ariko we amanuka yitwaje inkoni, aramusanga amushikuza icumu mu kuboko kwe ararimwicisha.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:24: 24.Ibyo ni byo Benaya mwene Yehoyada yakoze, yamamara muri abo bagabo batatu b’intwari.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:25: 25.Yari afite icyubahiro kuruta ba bandi mirongo itatu, ariko ntiyari ahwanye na batatu ba mbere. Dawidi amugira umutware w’abarinzi be.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:26: 26.Kandi abagabo b’abanyambaraga bo mu ngabo ze ni Asaheli murumuna wa Yowabu, na Eluhanani mwene Dodo w’i Betelehemu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:27: 27.na Shamoti w’Umuharari na Helesi w’Umupeloni,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:28: 28.na Ira mwene Ikeshi w’Umunyatekowa, na Abiyezeri w’Umunyanatoti,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:29: 29.na Sibekayi w’Umuhusha na Ilayi w’Umwahohi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:30: 30.na Maharayi w’Umunyanetofa, na Heledu mwene Bāna Umunyanetofa,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:31: 31.na Itayi mwene Ribayi w’i Gibeya y’Ababenyamini, na Benaya w’Umunyapiratoni,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:32: 32.na Hurayi wo ku tugezi tw’i Gāshi na Abiyeli w’Umunyaruba,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:33: 33.na Azimaveti w’Umunyabahurimu, na Eliyahaba w’i Shālabini.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:34: 34.Bene Hashemu w’Umugizoni ni Yonatani mwene Shage w’Umuharari,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:35: 35.na Ahiyamu mwene Sakari w’Umuharari na Elifali mwene Uri,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:36: 36.na Heferi w’Umumekerati na Ahiya w’Umupeloni,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:37: 37.na Hesero w’Umunyakarumeli na Nārayi mwene Ezubayi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:38: 38.na Yoweli murumuna wa Natani, na Mibuhari mwene Hagiri,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:39: 39.na Seleki w’Umwamoni, na Naharayi w’i Bēroti utwara intwaro za Yowabu mwene Seruya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:40: 40.na Ira w’Umuyeteri na Garebu w’Umuyeteri,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:41: 41.na Uriya w’Umuheti na Zabadi mwene Ahilayi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:42: 42.na Adina mwene Shiza w’Umurubeni, umutware w’Abarubeni n’abantu mirongo itatu hamwe na we,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:43: 43.na Hanāni mwene Māka na Yoshafati w’Umumituni,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:44: 44.na Uziya w’Umwashitaroti, na Shama na Yeyeli bene Hotamu w’Umunyaroweri,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:45: 45.na Yediyayeli mwene Shimuri na murumuna we Yoha w’Umutisi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:46: 46.na Eliyeli w’Umumahavi, na Yeribayi na Yoshaviya bene Elunāmu na Ituma w’Umumowabu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:11:47: 47.na Eliyeli na Obedi na Yāsiyeli w’Umumesoba.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:1: Ababanje kuyoboka Dawidi1.Aba ni bo basanze Dawidi i Sikulagi, ubwo yari acyihishe Sawuli mwene Kishi, bari muri za ntwari zamutabaraga mu ntambara.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:2: 2.Batwaraga imiheto bakabasha gutwarira amaboko yombi, bateresha amabuye imihumetso, barashisha n’imyambi imiheto. Bari bene wabo wa Sawuli bo mu Babenyamini.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:3: 3.Umukuru ni Ahiyezeri, agakurikirwa na Yowasi ari bo bene Shemaya w’i Gibeya, na Yeziyeli na Peleti bene Azimaveti, na Beraka na Yehu w’Umunyanatoti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:4: 4.Ishimaya w’i Gibeyoni yari umunyambaraga muri abo mirongo itatu, ari we wari umutware muri bo,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:5: 5.na Yeremiya na Yahaziyeli na Yohanani, na Yozabadi w’i Gedera,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:6: 6.na Eluzayi na Yerimoti na Beyaliya, na Shemariya na Shefatiya w’i Harufu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:7: 7.na Elukana na Ishiya na Azarēli, na Yowezeri na Yoshobeyamu b’Abakōra,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:8: 8.na Yowela na Zebadiya bene Yerohamu w’i Gedori.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:9: 9.Kandi no mu Bagadi hirobanuramo abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari bigishijwe kurwana, babasha gutwara ingabo n’icumu. Amaso yabo yasaga n’ay’intare, bari bafite umuvumbuko nk’uw’impara ziri ku gasozi, basanga Dawidi mu gihome cyo mu butayu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:10: 10.Umukuru ni Ezeri, uwa kabiri ni Obadiya, uwa gatatu ni Eliyabu,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:11: 11.uwa kane ni Mishumana, uwa gatanu ni Yeremiya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:12: 12.uwa gatandatu ni Atayi, uwa karindwi ni Eliyeli,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:13: 13.uwa munani ni Yohanani, uwa cyenda ni Elizabadi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:14: 14.uwa cumi ni Yeremiya, uwa cumi n’umwe ni Makubanayi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:15: 15.Abo Bagadi bari abatware b’ingabo, umutoya muri bo yari ahwanye n’abantu ijana, umukuru agahwana n’igihumbi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:16: 16.Abo ni bambutse Yorodani mu kwezi kwa mbere, Yorodani yuzuye irenze inkombe zose birukana abo mu bibaya bose, ab’iburasirazuba n’ab’iburengerazuba.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:17: 17.Bukeye Ababenyamini n’Abayuda baraza, basanga Dawidi mu gihome.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:18: 18.Dawidi asohorwa no kubasanganira arababwira ati “Niba muzanywe no kuntabara munzaniye amahoro, umutima wanjye n’iyanyu bizaba kimwe. Ariko niba muzanywe no kungambanira ku banzi banjye kandi nta rugomo nagize, Imana ya ba sogokuruza banyu ibirebe ibihane.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:19: 19.Maze umwuka aherako aza kuri Amasa, umutware wa ba bandi mirongo itatu aravuga ati “Turi abawe Dawidi, turi mu ruhande rwawe mwana wa Yesayi. Amahoro abe kuri wowe no ku bagutabara, kuko Imana yawe igutabara.” Dawidi aherako arabakira, abagira abatware b’umutwe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:20: 20.Kandi no mu Bamanase himūramo bamwe bakeza Dawidi, ubwo yajyanaga n’Abafilisitiya bateye Sawuli. Ariko ntibabavuna kuko abatware b’Abafilisitiya bamaze kujya inama bakamwirukana bagira bati “Azakeza shebuja Sawuli, ashyire imitwe yacu mu kaga.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:21: 21.Ubwo yajyaga i Sikulagi, akezwa na bamwe bo mu Bamanase, Aduna na Yozabadi na Yediyeli na Mikayeli, na Yozabadi na Elihu na Siletayi, abatware b’ibihumbi by’Abamanase.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:22: 22.Batabara Dawidi barwanya wa mutwe w’abanyazi, bose bari abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari kandi bari abatware b’ingabo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:23: 23.Nuko uko bukeye hakajya haza abantu batabara Dawidi, kugeza ubwo babaye ingabo nyinshi nk’ingabo z’Imana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:24: 24.Kandi iyi ni yo mibare y’imitwe y’ingabo zasanze Dawidi i Heburoni zitwaje intwaro, ngo bamuhindūrire ubwami bwa Sawuli nk’uko ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryari riri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:25: 25.Abayuda bitwazaga amacumu n’ingabo, bari ibihumbi bitandatu na magana inani biteguye kurwana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:26: 26.Abo mu Basimeyoni, abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari mu ntambara, bari ibihumbi birindwi n’ijana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:27: 27.Abo mu Balewi na bo bari ibihumbi bine na magana atandatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:28: 28.Kandi Yehoyada yari umutware w’inzu ya Aroni, ajyana n’ingabo ibihumbi bitatu na magana arindwi,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:29: 29.na Sadoki umusore w’imbaraga w’intwari n’abo mu nzu ya se, abatware makumyabiri na babiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:30: 30.Abo mu Babenyamini bene wabo wa Sawuli bari ibihumbi bitatu, kuko kugeza muri icyo gihe abarutaga ubwinshi muri bo bari bakomereye ku nzu ya Sawuli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:31: 31.Abo mu Befurayimu, abagabo b’abanyambaraga b’intwari b’ibirangirire mu mazu ya ba sekuruza, bari inzovu ebyiri na magana inani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:32: 32.Ab’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase bari inzovu imwe n’ibihumbi munani, abavuzwe mu mazina ngo baze bimike Dawidi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:33: 33.Abo mu Bisakari b’abanyabwenge bwo kumenya ibihe no kumenya ibyo Abisirayeli bakwiriye gukora, abatware babo bari magana abiri kandi bene wabo bose bumviraga itegeko ryabo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:34: 34.Abo mu Bazebuluni babashaga kujyana n’ingabo bakarema inteko, bari bafite intwaro z’intambara z’uburyo bwose batari abanyamitima ibiri, bari inzovu eshanu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:35: 35.Abo mu Banafutali, abatware igihumbi bari kumwe n’abitwaje amacumu n’ingabo, bari inzovu eshatu n’ibihumbi birindwi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:36: 36.Abo mu Badani ababashije kurema inteko, bari inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi munani na magana atandatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:37: 37.Abo mu Bashēri babashaga kujya mu rugamba bakirema inteko, bari inzovu enye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:38: 38.N’abo hakurya ya Yorodani, Abarubeni n’Abagadi n’ab’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase bafite intwaro z’intambara z’uburyo bwose, bari agahumbi n’inzovu ebyiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:39: 39.Izo ngabo zose z’abantu babashaga kwirema inteko, bazanywe i Heburoni bafite umutima utunganye no kwimika Dawidi ngo abe umwami wa Isirayeli yose, kandi n’abandi Bisirayeli bose bari bahuje umutima wo kwimika Dawidi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:40: 40.Basibirayo gatatu bari kumwe na Dawidi barya banywa, kuko bene wabo bari babahishiye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:12:41: 41.Kandi n’abari batuye bugufi bwaho ndetse ukageza Isakari n’i Zebuluni n’i Nafutali, bazanye imitsima ku ndogobe n’ingamiya n’inyumbu no ku nka, n’ibyokurya by’amafu n’imibumbe y’imbuto z’umutini n’amasere y’inzabibu zumye, na vino n’amavuta, n’inka n’intama byinshi cyane kuko mu Isirayeli harimo ibyishimo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:1: Dawidi ajya kwenda isanduku y’Uwiteka. Uza apfa. Isanduku iguma kwa Obededomu (2 Sam.6 1-11)1.Nuko Dawidi ajya inama n’abatware batwara ibihumbi, n’abatwara amagana n’abandi batware bose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:2: 2.Dawidi abwira iteraniro ry’Abisirayeli ryose ati “Ibi niba mubishima kandi niba bivuye ku Uwiteka Imana yacu, dutume hose kuri bene wacu basigaye mu gihugu cya Isirayeli cyose, no ku batambyi n’Abalewi bari mu midugudu yabo n’ibikingi byabo, kugira ngo bateranire aho turi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:3: 3.Tujye kugarura isanduku y’Imana yacu muri twe, kuko tutayitayeho ku ngoma ya Sawuli.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:4: 4.Abahateraniye bose bemera ko bagiye gukora batyo, kuko iyo nama abantu bose bayishimye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:5: 5.Nuko Dawidi ateranya Abisirayeli bose, uhereye i Shihori ku kagezi ka Egiputa ukageza aharasukirwa i Hamati, kugira ngo bajye kwenda isanduku y’Imana bayikure i Kiriyatiyeyarimu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:6: 6.Dawidi azamukana n’Abisirayeli bose bajya i Bāla, ari yo Kiriyatiyeyarimu y’Abayuda, kugira ngo bakureyo isanduku y’Uwiteka Imana, ari yo yicara ku Bakerubi ikitwa rya Zina.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:7: 7.Maze baheka isanduku y’Imana ku igare rishya, bayikura mu nzu ya Abinadabu, Uza na Ahiyo barayishorera.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:8: 8.Nuko Dawidi n’Abisirayeli bose biyerekera imbere y’Imana n’imbaraga zabo zose, baririmba bacuranga inanga na nebelu n’amashako n’ibyuma bivuga, bavuza n’amakondera.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:9: 9.Bageze ku mbuga ya Kidoni, Uza arambura ukuboko kuramira isanduku, kuko inka zari zitsikiye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:10: 10.Uburakari bw’Uwiteka bugurumanira kuri Uza aramwica, kuko yaramburiye ukuboko isanduku, agwa aho ngaho imbere y’Imana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:11: 11.Dawidi ababazwa n’uko Uwiteka asumiye Uza. Aho hantu ahahimba Peresuza na bugingo n’ubu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:12: 12.Uwo munsi Dawidi atinya Imana aravuga ati “Najyana nte isanduku y’Imana imuhira iwanjye?”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:13: 13.Nuko Dawidi ntiyacumbukura iyo sanduku ngo ayicyure iwe mu rurembo rwa Dawidi, ahubwo ayinyuza hirya ayicyura mu rugo rwa Obededomu w’Umugiti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:13:14: 14.Isanduku y’Uwiteka imara amezi atatu mu bo kwa Obededomu, iri mu rugo rwe. Uwiteka aha umugisha urugo rwa Obededomu n’ibyo yari afite byose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:1: Hiramu afasha Dawidi. Amazina y’abana ba Dawidi (2 Sam 5.11-16)1.Hiramu umwami w’i Tiro yohereza intumwa kuri Dawidi, n’ibiti by’imyerezi n’abazi kubakisha amabuye n’ababaji, ngo bamwubakire inzu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:2: 2.Nuko Dawidi amenya ko Uwiteka amukomereje ubwami bwa Isirayeli ngo bube ubwe, kuko ubwami bwe bwashyiriwe hejuru ku bw’ubwoko bwe bw’Abisirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:3: 3.Bukeye Dawidi yongera kurongora abandi bagore ari i Yerusalemu, yongera kubyara abana b’abahungu n’abakobwa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:4: 4.Kandi aya ni yo mazina y’abana yabyariye i Yerusalemu: Shamuwa na Shobabu na Natani na Salomo,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:5: 5.na Ibuhari na Elishuwa na Elifeleti,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:6: 6.na Noga na Nefegi na Yafiya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:7: 7.na Elishama na Bēliyada na Elifeleti.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:8: Dawidi anesha Abafilisitiya (2 Sam.5.17-25)8.Abafilisitiya bumvise ko Dawidi yimikishijwe amavuta ngo abe umwami wa Isirayeli yose, Abafilisitiya bose bazamurwa no kumutera. Dawidi abyumvise arabasanganira.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:9: 9.Icyo gihe Abafilisitiya baraje buzura ikibaya cy’Abarafa.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:10: 10.Dawidi agisha Imana inama ati “Ntere Abafilisitiya uzabangabiza?” Uwiteka aramusubiza ati “Genda kuko nzabakugabiza.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:11: 11.Nuko bazamukira i Bāliperasimu, Dawidi abatsindayo. Dawidi aherako aravuga ati “Imana yahomboje abanzi banjye ukuboko kwanjye nk’uko amazi ahomboka.” Ni cyo cyatumye aho hantu bahahimba Bāliperasimu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:12: 12.Kandi Abafilisitiya batayo ibigirwamana byabo, Dawidi ategeka ko babitwika.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:13: 13.Bukeye Abafilisitiya bongera kuzura cya kibaya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:14: 14.Dawidi yongera kugisha Imana inama. Imana iramubwira iti “We gutabara ubakurikiye, ahubwo ubace rubete ubarasukireho ahateganye n’ishyamba ry’imitugunguru.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:15: 15.Nuko niwumva ikiriri kirangīra hejuru y’ubushorishori bw’imitugunguru, uhereko utabare kuko Imana iri bube igutabariye imbere kunesha ingabo z’Abafilisitiya.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:16: 16.Nuko Dawidi abigenza uko Imana yamutegetse, batsinda ingabo z’Abafilisitiya uhereye i Gibeyoni ukageza i Gezeri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:14:17: 17.Maze inkuru ya Dawidi yamamara mu bihugu byose, Uwiteka atuma amahanga yose amutinya.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:1: Dawidi azana isanduku y’Imana mu rurembo (2 Sam. 6.12-23)1.Bukeye Dawidi yiyubakira amazu mu rurembo rwa Dawidi, atunganiriza isanduku y’Imana ahantu, ayibambira ihema.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:2: 2.Dawidi aravuga ati “Nta muntu ukwiriye kuremērwa isanduku y’Imana keretse Abalewi, kuko ari bo Uwiteka yatoranije kujya baremērwa isanduku y’Imana, bakayiremērwa iteka ryose.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:3: 3.Bukeye Dawidi ateraniriza Abisirayeli bose i Yerusalemu, ngo bajye kuzamura isanduku y’Uwiteka bayishyire ahantu hayo yayitunganirije.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:4: 4.Dawidi ateranya bene Aroni n’Abalewi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:5: 5.Muri bene Kohati, umukuru ni Uriyeli na bene se ijana na makumyabiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:6: 6.No muri bene Merari, umukuru ni Asaya na bene se magana abiri na makumyabiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:7: 7.No muri bene Gerushomu, umukuru ni Yoweli na bene se ijana na mirongo itatu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:8: 8.No muri bene Elisafani, umukuru ni Shemaya na bene se magana abiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:9: 9.No muri bene Heburoni, umukuru ni Eliyeli na bene se mirongo inani.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:10: 10.No muri bene Uziyeli, umukuru ni Aminadabu na bene se ijana na cumi na babiri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:11: 11.Dawidi ahamagaza Sadoki na Abiyatari abatambyi, n’Abalewi ari bo Uriyeli na Asaya na Yoweli, na Shemaya na Eliyeli na Aminadabu
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:12: 12.arababwira ati “Mwebwe muri abatware b’amazu ya ba sekuruza b’Abalewi. Mwiyeze ubwanyu ndetse na bene wanyu, mubone kujya kuzamura isanduku y’Uwiteka Imana ya Isirayeli, muyishyire ahantu nayitunganirije.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:13: 13.Kuko ubwa mbere atari mwe mwayihetse, ni cyo cyatumye Uwiteka Imana yacu idusumira, kuko tutayishatse nk’uko itegeko ritegeka.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:14: 14.Nuko abatambyi n’Abalewi biyereza kujya kuzamura isanduku y’Uwiteka Imana ya Isirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:15: 15.(Bagezeyo) Abalewi baremērwa isanduku y’Imana, bashyira imijisho yayo ku ntugu zabo nk’uko Mose yategetse, uko ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryari riri.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:16: 16.Dawidi abwira abatware b’Abalewi gutoranya abaririmbyi muri bene wabo ngo bazane ibintu bivuga: nebelu n’inanga n’ibyuma birenga, babivuze cyane barangurura ijwi n’ibyishimo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:17: 17.Nuko Abalewi batoranya Hemani mwene Yoweli, no muri bene Asafu mwene Berekiya, no muri bene se bene Merari, Etani mwene Kushaya,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:18: 18.kandi hamwe na bo bene wabo aba kabiri kuri bo, ari bo Zekariya na Beni, na Yeziyeli na Shemiramoti, na Yehiyeli na Uni na Eliyabu, na Benaya na Māseya na Matitiya, na Elifelehu na Mikuneya, na Obededomu na Yeyeli, bari abarinzi b’irembo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:19: 19.Uko ni ko batoranije abaririmbyi: Hemani na Asafu na Etani, bazanye ibyuma by’imiringa birenga byo kuvuza cyane.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:20: 20.Zekariya na Aziyeli, na Shemiramoti na Yehiyeli na Uni, na Eliyabu na Māseya na Benaya, bazanye nebelu bazibwirisha ijwi rito.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:21: 21.Matitiya na Elifelehu na Mikuneya, na Obededomu na Yeyeli na Azaziya, bari bafite inanga babwirisha ijwi ryo mu gituza zo kubaterera indirimbo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:22: 22.Kenaniya umutware w’Abalewi waremērwaga isanduku, ni we wategekaga ibyo kuyiremērwa kuko yari umunyabwenge.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:23: 23.Berekiya na Elukana bari abakumirizi b’isanduku.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:24: 24.Shebaniya na Yashofati, na Netanēli na Amasiya, na Zekariya na Benaya na Eliyezeri abatambyi, ni bo bagendaga bavuza amakondera imbere y’isanduku y’Imana. Obededomu na Yehiya bari abakumirizi b’irembo ry’isanduku.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:25: 25.Nuko Dawidi n’abakuru ba Isirayeli, n’abatware batwara ibihumbi bajya kuzamura isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka, bayikura kwa Obededomu bishima.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:26: 26.Maze ubwo Imana ifashije Abalewi bari baremērewe isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka, baherako batamba amapfizi arindwi n’amasekurume y’ihene arindwi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:27: 27.Kandi Dawidi yari yambaye umwitero w’igitare cyiza, Abalewi bose na bo bari baremērewe isanduku, n’abaririmbyi na Kenaniya umutware w’abahetsi, bose bari bambaye batyo. Kandi Dawidi yari yambaye efodi y’igitare.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:28: 28.Uko ni ko Abisirayeli bose bazamuye isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka basakuriza hejuru, bavuza ihembe n’amakondera n’ibyuma birenga, bacuranga nebelu n’inanga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:15:29: 29.Nuko bagisohoza isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka mu rurembo rwa Dawidi, Mikali umukobwa wa Sawuli arungurukira mu idirishya, abona Dawidi aca ikibungo abyina amugayira mu mutima.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:1: Ibirori byo kugarura isanduku, na zaburi bashimishije Imana (Zab.96.1-13; 105.1-15; 106.1,47-48)1.Nuko binjiza isanduku y’Imana bayitereka hagati mu ihema Dawidi yari yayibambiye, baherako batambira imbere y’Imana ibitambo byoswa, n’iby’ishimwe yuko bari amahoro.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:2: 2.Dawidi amaze gutamba igitambo cyoswa n’ibitambo by’ishimwe yuko ari amahoro, asabira abantu umugisha mu izina ry’Uwiteka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:3: 3.Maze agaburira abantu ba Isirayeli bose, abagabo n’abagore, umuntu wese amuha irobe ry’umutsima n’igiti cy’inyama, n’umubumbe w’inzabibu zumye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:4: 4.Kandi ashyiraho bamwe mu Balewi ngo bakorere imbere y’isanduku y’Uwiteka, bajye bibutsa bashima Uwiteka Imana ya Isirayeli bayisingiza.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:5: 5.Abo ni aba: Asafu yari umukuru agakurikirwa na Zekariya, na Yeyeli na Shemiramoti, na Yehiyeli na Matitiya, na Eliyabu na Benaya, na Obededomu na Yeyeli bari bafite nebelu n’inanga, kandi Asafu yari afite ibyuma birenga avuza cyane,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:6: 6.na Benaya na Yahaziyeli abatambyi, bajyaga bavugiriza amakondera imbere y’isanduku y’isezerano ry’Imana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:7: 7.Uwo munsi ni wo Dawidi yatangiye gutegeka Asafu na bene se kuba ari bo bashima Uwiteka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:8: 8.Nimushime Uwiteka mwambaze izina rye, Mwamamaze imirimo yakoze mu mahanga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:9: 9.Mumuririmbire, mumuririmbire n’ishimwe, Muvuge imirimo itangaza yakoze yose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:10: 10.Mwīrāte izina rye ryera, Imitima y’abashaka Uwiteka yishime.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:11: 11.Mushake Uwiteka n’imbaraga ze, Mushake mu maso he iteka ryose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:12: 12.Mwibuke imirimo itangaza yakoze, Ibitangaza bye n’amateka yo mu kanwa ke.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:13: 13.Mwa rubyaro rwa Isirayeli umugaragu we mwe, Mwa bana ba Yakobo mwe, abo yatoranije,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:14: 14.Uwiteka ni we Mana yacu, Amateka ye ari mu isi yose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:15: 15.Mujye mwibuka isezerano rye iminsi yose, Ijambo yategetse ibihe ibihumbi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:16: 16.Ni ryo sezerano yasezeranye na Aburahamu, N’indahiro yarahiye Isaka,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:17: 17.Akayikomereza Yakobo kuba itegeko, Akayikomereza Isiraheli kuba isezerano ridashira.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:18: 18.Ati “Ni wowe nzaha igihugu cy’i Kanāni, Kuba umwandu ukugerewe.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:19: 19.Umubare wabo ukiri muke, Muke cyane, na bo ari abashyitsi muri icyo gihugu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:20: 20.Bazereraga mu mahanga atari amwe, Bava mu gihugu cy’umwami bakajya mu kindi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:21: 21.Ntiyakundira umuntu ko abarenganya, Ndetse yabacyahiye abami.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:22: 22.Ati “Ntimukore ku bo nasīze, Ntimugire icyo mutwara abahanuzi banjye.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:23: 23.Muririmbire Uwiteka, mwe abari mu isi mwese, Mwerekane agakiza ke uko bukeye.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:24: 24.Mwogeze icyubahiro cye mu mahanga, Imirimo itangaza yakoze muyogeze mu mahanga yose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:25: 25.Kuko Uwiteka akomeye, akwiriye gusingizwa cyane, Kandi ateye ubwoba arusha imana zose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:26: 26.Kuko imana z’abanyamahanga zose ari ibigirwamana, Ariko Uwiteka ni we waremye ijuru.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:27: 27.Icyubahiro n’igitinyiro biri kuri we,Imbaraga n’ibyishimo biri iwe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:28: 28.Mwa miryango y’amahanga mwe, mwāturire Uwiteka yuko afite icyubahiro n’imbaraga.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:29: 29.Mwāturire Uwiteka yuko izina rye rifite icyubahiro, Muze imbere ye muzanye ituro, Musengane Uwiteka ubwiza bwo kwera.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:30: 30.Mwe abari mu isi mwese mwe, Muhindire imishitsi imbere ye, Isi irakomeye ntibasha kunyeganyega.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:31: 31.Ijuru rinezerwe isi yishime, Bavugire mu mahanga bati “Uwiteka ari ku ngoma.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:32: 32.Inyanja ihorerane n’ibiyuzuye, Mu gasozi hishimane n’ibihari byose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:33: 33.Ni bwo ibiti byo mu ishyamba bizaririmbishwa n’ibyishimo imbere y’Uwiteka, Kuko azanwa no gucira abari mu isi imanza.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:34: 34.Nimushimire Uwiteka yuko ari mwiza, Kuko imbabazi ze zihoraho iteka ryose. 118.1; 136.1; Yer 33.11
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:35: 35.Muvuge muti “Mana y’agakiza kacu, udukize.” Utubumbire hamwe udukuye mu mahanga, Kugira ngo dushime izina ryawe ryera, Twishimire ishimwe ryawe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:36: 36.Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli isingizwe, Uhereye kera kose ukageza iteka ryose. Nuko abantu bose baravuga bati “Amen”, basingiza Uwiteka.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:37: 37.Hanyuma asigayo Asafu na bene se imbere y’isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka, kugira ngo bahore bakorera imbere y’iyo sanduku, nk’uko byari bikwiriye imirimo y’iminsi yose,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:38: 38.na Obededomu na bene se mirongo itandatu n’umunani, kandi Obededomu mwene Yedutuni na Hosa baba abakumirizi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:39: 39.Kandi ashyiraho Sadoki umutambyi, na bene se b’abatambyi imbere y’ihema ry’Uwiteka ryari ku kanunga k’i Gibeyoni,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:40: 40.kugira ngo bajye batambira Uwiteka ibitambo byoswa ku cyotero cy’ibitambo byoswa mu gitondo na nimugoroba, nk’uko byari byaranditswe byose mu mategeko y’Uwiteka yategetse Abisirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:41: 41.Kandi hamwe na bo ashyiraho Hemani na Yedutuni n’abandi batoranijwe bakavugwa mu mazina yabo, kugira ngo bahimbaze Uwiteka kuko imbabazi ze zihoraho iteka ryose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:42: 42.Kandi Hemani na Yedutuni abo bagiraga amakondera n’ibyuma birenga by’abantu bajyaga bavuza, bagiraga n’ibintu bitera indirimbo z’Imana. Kandi bashyiraho bene Yedutuni ngo barinde irembo.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:16:43: 43.Abantu bose baherako barataha umuntu wese ajya iwe, Dawidi asubira iwe ajya gusabira inzu ye umugisha.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:1: Dawidi ahakanirwa kubakira Imana inzu (2 Sam.7.1-11)1.Nuko Dawidi aganje mu nzu ye abwira umuhanuzi Natani ati “Dore jyewe mba mu nzu y’imyerezi, ariko isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka ikaba mu ihema.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:2: 2.Natani asubiza Dawidi ati “Kora uko umutima wawe ushaka kose, kuko Imana iri kumwe nawe.”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:3: 3.Iryo joro ijambo ry’Imana rigera kuri Natani, iravuga iti
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:4: 4.“Genda ubwire umugaragu wanjye Dawidi uti ‘Umva uko Uwiteka avuze ati: Ntuzanyubakire inzu yo kubamo,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:5: 5.kuko ntabwo nigeze kuba mu nzu uhereye ku munsi nazamuriye Abisirayeli kugeza ubu, ahubwo najyaga mva mu ihema nkajya mu rindi, nava mu buturo nkajya mu bundi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:6: 6.Mbese ahantu hose nagendaniye n’Abisirayeli bose, hari ubwo navuganaga n’umucamanza wese w’Abisirayeli, uwo nategetse kuragira ubwoko bwanjye nti: Ni iki cyababujije kunyubakira inzu y’imyerezi?’
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:7: 7.“Nuko ubwire umugaragu wanjye Dawidi uti ‘Uwiteka Nyiringabo avuze atya ati: Nagukuye mu rugo rw’intama no mu bwungeri bwazo, ngo ube umwami w’ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:8: 8.Kandi nabanaga nawe aho wajyaga hose, nkarimbura abanzi bawe bose imbere yawe, kandi nzaguha izina rihwanye n’amazina y’abakomeye bo mu isi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:9: 9.Kandi nzagerera ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli ahantu, mpabashinge bahature habe ahantu habo bwite be kuzimuka ukundi. Kandi abanyarugomo ntibazongera kubaburabuza nk’ubwa mbere,
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:10: 10.nko mu gihe nategekeye abacamanza gutwara ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli: nzajya ncogoza ababisha bawe bose. Kandi ndakubwira yuko Uwiteka azakubakira inzu.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:11: Imana isezeranya Dawidi n’urubyaro rwe umugisha (2 Sam 7.12-17)11.“ ‘Kandi iminsi yawe yo gusanga ba sogokuruza nigera, nzaherako mpagarike urubyaro rwawe rukuzungure, umwe wo mu bahungu bawe nkomeze ubwami bwe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:12: 12.Uwo ni we uzanyubakira inzu, kandi nzakomeza ingoma ye iteka ryose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:13: 13.Nzamubera se na we azambera umwana. Sinzamukuraho imbabazi zanjye nk’uko nazikuye ku wakubanjirije.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:14: 14.Ahubwo nzamubesha mu nzu yanjye no mu bwami bwanjye iteka ryose, kandi ingoma ye izakomezwa iteka ryose.’ ”
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:15: 15.Ayo magambo yose n’uko kwerekwa kose, ni ko Natani yabibwiye Dawidi.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:16: Isengesho rya Dawidi (2 Sam 7.18-29)16.Umwami Dawidi aherako arinjira yicara imbere y’Uwiteka aravuga ati “Nkanjye ndi nde Uwiteka Mana, n’inzu yanjye ni iki, nkawe kunzana ukarinda ungeza aha?
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:17: 17.Ndetse ibyo byari byoroshye imbere yawe Mana, ariko uvuze no ku by’inzu y’umugaragu wawe bizashyira kera, kandi urarebye umpwanya n’umuntu w’umunyacyubahiro kinini, Uwiteka Mana.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:18: 18.Jyewe Dawidi, nabasha kukubwira iki kandi ku by’icyubahiro umugaragu wawe ngiriwe? Kuko ari wowe uzi umugaragu wawe.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:19: 19.Uwiteka, ibyo bikomeye byose wabikoreye umugaragu wawe nk’uko umutima wawe wibwira, kugira ngo werekane ibyo bikomeye byose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:20: 20.Uwiteka, nta wuhwanye nawe, nta yindi mana keretse wowe nk’uko twabyumvishije amatwi yacu byose.
1_ibyo_ku_ngoma:17:21: 21.Kandi ni irihe shyanga mu isi rihwanye n’ubwoko bwawe bwa Isirayeli, Imana yicunguriye ngo ribe ubwoko bwayo, ukibonera izina uriheshejwe n’ibikomeye biteye ubwoba wakoze, ubwo wirukaniraga amahanga imbere y’ubwoko bwawe wacunguye, ukabukura muri Egiputa?
